data.name: Ledyba
data.flavorText: These very cowardly Pokémon join together and use Reflect to protect their nest.

data.name: Rowlet
data.flavorText: At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks.

data.name: Gossifleur
data.flavorText: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.

data.name: Growlithe
data.flavorText: Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own Trainer from harm.

data.name: Victini
data.flavorText: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.

data.name: Lapras
data.flavorText: Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokémon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: When Pikachu meet, they'll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.

data.name: Chinchou
data.flavorText: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.

data.name: Flaaffy
data.flavorText: It stores electricity in its fluffy fleece. If it stores up too much, it will start to go bald in those patches.

data.name: Tynamo
data.flavorText: One alone can emit only trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.

data.name: Cutiefly
data.flavorText: An opponent's aura can tell Cutiefly what that opponent's next move will be. Then Cutiefly can glide around the attack and strike back.

data.name: Bewear
data.flavorText: The moves it uses to take down its prey would make a martial artist jealous. It tucks subdued prey under its arms to carry them to its nest.

data.name: Pangoro
data.flavorText: Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of its opponents. It strikes with punches that can turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.

data.name: Drampa
data.flavorText: Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it's angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.

data.name: Smeargle
data.flavorText: It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.
